comments.creator: jfkthame@gmail.com
comments.author: jfkthame@gmail.com
comments.text: The font-family telemetry added by bug 1619349 is broken for Windows because of a copy/paste error in the DirectWrite impl of GetVisibilityForFamily -- it never returns the LangPack value. :(
comments.raw_text: The font-family telemetry added by bug 1619349 is broken for Windows because of a copy/paste error in the DirectWrite impl of GetVisibilityForFamily -- it never returns the LangPack value. :(
